objects.text:
• Hi-Res Audio Quality
• Deep Bass & Noise Reduction
• Comfortable Foam Ear Cups
• Built-in Microphone

product_details.description: Noise Reduction Technology: High Definition Stereo Headphones, noise reduction technology designed to reduce surrounding noise so that you can enjoy what you want to hear. Lose yourself in music even in the lowest volume levels! 40mm sound driver for true richness in sound and deep bass. EASY CONNECTIVITY: Gabba Goods Headphones are compatible with all Bluetooth or 3.5mm plug cable enabled devices such as , iPhones, Smart android phones, Tablet, Laptop, iPads, MP3/4 Player, Computers, MacBook and other Bluetooth devices. Just slide the on/off button and the headphones will be in ready to pair mode. It is built to provide a quick and stable Bluetooth connection and to enable hands-free communication through our special noise reduction technology Super Comfortable design: The Cushioned Ear Muffs are made of artificial leather so that you can wear them for extended time with comfort. The Headset is foldable for easy storage and travel. Great for use by Unisex Kids, Teens and Adults. Built-in microphone: For clear hands-free calling. Enjoy Speaking and Talking Handsfree A highly sensitive microphone that is perfect for capturing clear audio, Micro SD card support: And volume and pause/play functions , allows you to conveniently Listen to Your Favorite Music Audio books, and Podcasts. Brand - Gabba Goods ** Color - Lavender ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Impedance - 26 Ohm **

banner_details:
This vibrant banner promotes a premium wireless headphone product featuring a modern, tech-inspired layout. The main visual element is a sleek product image (`product_image`) placed prominently on the right. A striking headline (`heading`) in a bold, 3D font at the top grabs attention and is followed by a clean subheading (`subheading`) to communicate the product category. A feature list (`description`) on bullet points details key benefits. A stylish tagline (`tagline`) reinforces the luxury theme. Price information (`price`) is showcased in large font, paired with a bold call-to-action button (`cta_background`, `cta`). The gradient background uses abstract curves and light flares, adding depth and elegance.

**Color Palette:**
- Lavender (#E6E6FA)
- Deep Purple (#4B0082)
- Medium Slate Blue (#9370DB)
- Indigo (#483D8B)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Royal Purple (#6A0DAD)
product_color: The product image showcases sleek, modern headphones in a monochromatic lavender color palette. The primary color is a soft metallic lavender (#C7A7E2), used on the earcups and headband exterior, highlighting a glossy and futuristic aesthetic. Accents of deeper violet (#7D5BA6) appear in the inner cushioning, adding depth and contrast. A cooler, muted purple-gray (#A188C6) is used on structural elements like the hinges. The color transitions are smooth and visually harmonious, blending soft gradients with subtle reflections to enhance the sense of dimension. For ad banners, this palette evokes elegance, calmness, and modernity, appealing strongly to a youthful and stylish audience.
